QuestData.Title: Ogre Diplomacy
QuestData.Description: They may be spirits, but the Ango'rosh are still ogres. Even with their books in hand, they won't respect you until you prove yourself, and there's only one way to earn that.$B$BBy killing them.$B$BYou should take out as many of the Ango'rosh spirits and their pets as you can while in the ruins.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Ango'rosh in the Ango'rosh Ruins.
QuestData.RewardText: <Liadrin smiles.>$B$BI knew they'd see it our way.
